Disabled: Setting to true disables the module
ShowRecommendationToConfigure: If true, users will get a message suggesting to enable 2FA if it's not enabled in their accounts yet
FacetIds: List of app-key-hashes of mobile apps
ClockTolerance: Value set to N means that codes starting from N * 30sec ago to N * 30sec from now are accepted
AllowBackupCodes: If set to true, and if authenticator app or security key configured, users are able to use backup codes
TrustDevicesForDays: Allows for expiry of trusted device list entries after certain amount of days; if set to 0, managing trusted devices is disabled.
IncludeInMobile: If true, the module is used in mobile version of the interface
IncludeInDesktop: If true, the module is used in desktop version of the interface
RequireInMobile: List of other modules required by this module
